description: This patriotic dessert was created by Ms Dupree, the prolific author of Southern cookbooks, in celebration of the Statue of Liberty’s 100th birthday, in 1986 It's easy to prepare, and it can be adapted for use with almost any sweet and ripe summer fruit.
title: Nathalie Dupree’s Liberty Cobbler
title_page: Nathalie Dupree’s Liberty Cobbler Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This patriotic dessert was created by Ms. Dupree, the prolific author of Southern cookbooks, in celebration of the Statue of Liberty’s 100th birthday, in 1986. It's easy to prepare, and it can be adapted for use with almost any sweet and ripe summer fruit.
Featured in: For Liberty's 100 Th, Fireworks From 12 Top Chefs.
